mapper.insert: insert into news_content(contentid, contenttype, contentvalue, contentsort, nid) values(#{contentid},#{contenttype},#{contentvalue},#{contentsort},#{nid})
mapper.select: select count(nid) as valueinfo from news a where a.isdel = '0'

select nid,title,getcodetxt('newsstatus',a.status) status,a.status statusnum, date_format(a.createdatetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createdatetime from news a where a.isdel = '0' order by createdatetime desc limit #{startnum},#{getrows}
mapper.update: update news set status = #{status} where nid = #{nid}
